tweet.text: At the United Nations in June 2001, Sec. Powell warned that the HIV/AIDS crisis posed “a clear and present danger to the world.” In 2003, Pres. Bush and Sec. Powell advocated for and launched the President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief (@PEPFAR). 📷 @GWBLibrary https://t.co/j41kDBNFxP
